name: Axiom (DisasterSoup)
description:
Current playtest build for Axiom - a third-person parkour game set in a non-euclidean world. 

We would appreciate it if you could fill out this form after playing! Google Form Link

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Control/Ctrl - Crouch/Slide/Roll

R - Respawn

Actions:

Horizontal wall run by looking anywhere on the wall and jumping onto it when parallel to the wall.

Vertical wall run by looking at a wall and jumping onto it.

Roll by pressing left control before landing when falling from a large height.
